editProfile.siteIdHelper: Enter the monitoring site ID assigned to you
editProfile.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
editProfile.siteIdRequired: Site ID is required for field personnel
editProfile.centralAnalystDesc: CWC headquarters staff for data analysis
editProfile.fieldPersonnelDesc: On-ground staff taking water level readings

publicUpload.helpMonitor: Help us monitor water levels in your area
publicUpload.contributionInfo: Your reports help authorities monitor water conditions. All submissions are reviewed before being added to our system.
publicUpload.locationPlaceholder: Enter the location (e.g., Yamuna River near ITO Bridge)
publicUpload.gpsAttached: ЁЯУб GPS coordinates will be attached automatically
publicUpload.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what you observed (water level, flooding, drought conditions, etc.)
publicUpload.waterLevelPlaceholder: Enter approximate water level if known
publicUpload.waterLevelHelper: If you can see a gauge or have measurement tools
publicUpload.contactPlaceholder: Phone or email (in case we need to follow up)
publicUpload.contactPrivacy: Your contact info will be kept private
publicUpload.privacyPoint1: тАв Your location data helps identify affected areas
publicUpload.privacyPoint2: тАв Photos may be used for verification and analysis
publicUpload.privacyPoint3: тАв Contact information is optional and kept confidential
publicUpload.privacyPoint4: тАв Reports are reviewed before being made public
publicUpload.privacyPoint5: тАв Data is used for flood monitoring and public safety
publicUpload.incompleteMessage: Please provide location and a detailed description (minimum 10 characters).
publicUpload.thankYou: Thank you for your contribution! Your report has been submitted for review.
publicUpload.tryAgain: Unable to submit report. Please try again.
publicUpload.cameraImplemented: Camera functionality will be implemented with expo-camera.
publicUpload.captureError: Unable to capture photo. Please try again.

onboarding.slide1Desc: Revolutionary water level monitoring with AI-powered accuracy and security. Monitor river levels like never before.
onboarding.slide2Desc: GPS-based location validation ensures readings are captured only from designated monitoring sites. No more location fraud.
onboarding.slide3Desc: Scan site-specific QR codes to verify authenticity and prevent unauthorized data entry from wrong locations.
onboarding.slide4Desc: Advanced OCR and computer vision automatically detect water levels from gauge photos with 99% accuracy.
onboarding.slide5Desc: Live camera enforcement with metadata tagging. No gallery uploads allowed - ensuring authentic, timestamped evidence.
onboarding.slide6Desc: Work seamlessly in remote areas. Data syncs automatically when connectivity returns. Never lose critical measurements.
onboarding.slide7Desc: Live dashboard integration with tamper detection and instant alerts. Supervisors track data across multiple sites.
onboarding.slide8Desc: Join thousands of field personnel ensuring accurate, secure water level monitoring for flood prevention and disaster preparedness.

supervisor.failedToLoad: Failed to load dashboard data. Please try again.
supervisor.failedToRefresh: Failed to refresh data. Please try again.
